text: Bridalveil Fall. The following is a list of Yosemite waterfalls, including ephemeral falls: * Alder Creek Falls * Bridalveil Fall * California Fall * Chilnualna Falls * Horsetail Fall * Illilouette Fall * Lehamite Falls * LeConte Falls * Nevada Fall * Pywiack Cascade * Quaking Aspen Falls * Ribbon Fall * Royal Arch Cascade * Sentinel Fall * Silver Strand Falls * Snow Creek Falls * Staircase Falls * Three Chute Falls * Tueeulala Falls * Tuolumne Fall * Vernal Fall * Wapama Falls * Waterwheel Falls * White Cascade * Wildcat Falls * Yosemite Falls ==References== ==External links== * NPS.gov: Waterfalls in Yosemite National Park * Yosemite waterfalls Yosemite Yosemite
title: List of waterfalls in Yosemite National Park
